Is it advisable to pay off hdb loan faster monthly via cpf? Eg instalment is $100 but I can afford to pay $200 using cpf so I pay $200 monthly
? Low effective interest rate (unless you did not max out your uob one account on 31 Dec 2023)
The longer you drag  the more accrued interest you will incur. So its better to.Maybe you will want to explore doing a lump sum reduction every year after your bonus if your job pays you bonuses?
If u can get higher returns than 2.6% then feel free to invest with cash.

Conservative way would be to pay up quickly.Balanced way would be to maintain the current instalments of $100 and use your OA to buy t-bills (instead of 'pre-paying' your HDB loan) which currently still outperforms the 2.6% that u are paying for HDB loan.
just need to empty out uob one on 30 Dec  then can get extra cashback on top of the full 5% on $100k
Yup  the only use case is assuming one did empty his uob one ac on 31 dec.
Which is what ppl who are registering to this promo are doing
